name: Steam Empire
description:
This is a game I made in 2006 with a couple of friends for PyWeek! 

The goal of Steam Empire is to create a profitable railway company in 90 seconds. You do this by laying down railways, growing the city, buying industries, and connecting them via trade routes. Super simple controls.

Here's the entry's page:

https://pyweek.org/e/PySwec/

The itch version will have a few fixes to the one that were submitted for the contest. Make sure to check the readme. :)

The source code is included!
